subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: The Nets, who beat the Pistons in their finale, are trying to build up the franchise’s first playoff appearance since 2007 — and the first playoff appearance by a Brooklyn team since 1956.
snippet: The Nets, who beat the Pistons in their finale, are trying to build up the franchise’s first playoff appearance since 2007 — and the first playoff appearance by a Brooklyn team since 1956.
